attributes.action: Dangerous Weaving & Undercutting Manoeuvres on Motorways
attributes.additional_details: There is too much focus on punishing motorists for small speed infringements on motorways and too little focus on punishing drivers for dangerous manoeuvres such as weaving in and out of vehicles and overtaking vehicles in the slow lane (without giving drivers in the middle lane the opportunity to move over first). The police should be encouraged to prosecute drivers for dangerous weaving and dangerous undercutting manoeuvres which are more likely to cause serious accidents instead of focusing on petty speed infringements.
